long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Verbal Filter by AI â€“ an extension for monitoring and safeguarding content on web pages.

Main Features:
1. Detection of Toxic Content
Automatically scans text on web pages to identify toxic elements, such as:
Offensive or abusive language.
Aggressive comments.
Other harmful content.
Supports analysis of:
Headers (e.g., H1, H2).
Links (Anchor tags).
Text blocks (Paragraphs, Divs, Spans).

2. Visual Marking of Toxic Content
Detected toxic elements are highlighted in red for easy identification.
"Hide Dangerous Content" Option:
Replaces harmful content with the message [Content removed].
Smooth transitions enhance the user experience when content is hidden.

3. Adjustable Sensitivity Levels
Users can adjust sensitivity levels (from 0.1 to 0.9) to control the detection threshold.
Customizable analysis criteria:
Toxicity (General toxicity).
Severe Toxicity (High severity toxicity).
Insults (Harmful language).

4. Content Analysis Visualization
On the extension analytics page (accessed by clicking the extension icon):
Charts display the percentage of toxic and non-toxic content on the current page.
Text-based statistics summarize the total number of elements, toxic elements, and their distribution.

5. Real-Time Content Analysis
Ensures that newly added elements on the page are analyzed automatically:
Ideal for dynamically loaded content, such as social media comments or chat messages.
Ensures detection of toxic content even in newly loaded sections.

6. Simple and Intuitive Interface
Minimalistic design for easy access to settings.
Color-coded markers and charts for visual representation of analysis results.

Who Is This Extension For?
Parents: Protect children from harmful content on the web.
Social Media Users: Filter toxic comments or content.
Bloggers/Content Managers: Quickly analyze text on websites before publishing.

Technical Details:
Powered by a modern API for toxicity analysis.
Utilizes a server for machine-based content analysis (TensorFlow-based).
Analyzed content data is not stored locally, ensuring privacy and security.
